title: ASC-EC
definition: Access Service Coordination - Exchange Company Identifies the ICSC code of the Access Service Coordination - Exchange Company (ASC-EC )  whenever an access service passes through more than one provider territory.
fieldNotes: An entry in this field indicates that a Multi-EC Form must be associated with this access service request.
validEntryNotes:
A valid entry of "E" is applicable when the ACT field is "N", "C" or "D". 
A valid entry of "N" is only applicable when the AC T  field is "N".  
A valid entry of "D" is only applicable when the AC T  field is "D".
usageNotes:
Required when multiple providers are involved in providing access service and the EVCI field is not equal to "B".  
Required when the JPR field is populated. 
Otherwise prohibited.
